description:
Breathable and wicking, this tee will keep you comfy while you push yourself on the trail. Made from a lightweight dot knit recycled poly blend, the Summit Crevasse tee pulls moisture away from you skin, helping keep you cool when the mercury climbs.

  • Dot knit material improves wicking and quick drying properties
  • Lightweight panels under the arms and on the back for enhanced breathability
  • Contoured patterning for great mobility
  • Regular fit wears just like you want it to
name: The North Face Summit Crevasse Short Sleeve Tee - Men's
